articles.title: Manitoba health-care workers get province’s first coronavirus vaccine doses - Global News
articles.description: Watch the first vaccinations live in this story.
articles.content:
The first Manitobans to get the long-awaited COVID-19 vaccine received their shot Wednesday morning.
The first person was inoculated at about 8:40 a.m., with two more shortly after.

articles.title: British scientists investigating new strain of coronavirus, but downplay concerns - CBC.ca
articles.description: British scientists said Tuesday they are trying to establish whether the rapid spread in southern England of a new variant of the virus that causes COVID-19 is linked to key mutations they have detected in the strain.

articles.title: Ottawa adds 13 COVID-19 cases amid change in provincial data reporting - Global News
articles.description: Ottawa Public Health is reporting 13 new coronavirus cases as the nation's capital begins its COVID-19 vaccination campaign on Tuesday.
articles.content:
